posts.post_content:
Finally got around to scanning some of my Old Judge metamorphic cards and it looks like I'm a couple variations short according to the Old Judge book (Figure 2 & Figure 3 on page 63).

Figure 2 - Number "35" is overprinted with a "25" in pink

Figure 3 - Red diagonal overprint reading "Send us 25 empty covers of boxes or 25 slips, in place of 35 slips as advertised"

If anyone happens to have either of these variations available, please send me a PM and I'll try to be more than fair on price.

Thanks in advance!

[img]https://i.ibb.co/v4SVxpz/274714942-1149985025831222-3977633300549963812-n.jpg[/img]
